Title: Dona Flor and Her 2 Husbands
Actors: Giulia Gam, Edson Celulari, Marco Nanini
Plot: Dona Flor marries Vadinho, who is very handsome and passionate, but does not offer him much. She supports the family by cooking for her neighbors, but the husband bets most of the money. Vadinho dies suddenly and Dona Flor begins ...
